verses.roman:
rāya kahe,--"kaha āge aṅgera viśeṣa"
śrī-rūpa kahena kichu saṅkṣepa-uddeśa

synonyms: rāya kahe—Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya says; kaha—please tell me; āge—further; aṅgera viśeṣa—particular portions; śrī-rūpa kahena—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī says; kichu—something; saṅkṣepa—in brief; uddeśa—reference.
translation: When Rāmānanda Rāya requested Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī to speak further about various portions of the play, Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī briefly quoted his Lalita-mādhava.
